directions: Combine sweetened condensed milk, lime zest, lime juice, lightly beaten egg yolks, and salt; blend until mixture thickens. Stir in avocado pulp.  Pour filling into pie shell.
Chill pie several hours. Garnish with whipped cream, and serve.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Avocado Lime Pie
